title: Blitzcranks poro adventure
body:
Does this awesome fun game still get any maintainence ever?  I just went to play it cause I remember it being awesome and it crashes 100% of time when clicking story or infinite modes. It's obv not a priority but would b cool if someone could make it functional :) 

Ps. On iPhone 6

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This isn't something we're maintaining, AFAIK, due to it being a limited time piece of content that was removed from the store shortly after the arcade event. Would you be able to give me any errors you're experiencing, or is it just crashing?

no specific errors :(  just crashes upon clicking either the "story mode" "infinite mode" or even the tutorial.  i understand that its prob not worth the resources to fix cause its not actually available anymore but i would be cool if it still worked :)

Okay, quick troubleshooting stuff - 

1. Kill the app; To kill an app running in the background or force it to quit, double-click on the Home button to access the new app switcher or multitasking tray and then swipe up on the app that you want to close. 

2. Restart the device. 

Have you tried both of these? (Probably, but I just want to be sure.)

OK so this is awkward and i feel bad now but, after restarting my phone (which i SWEAR i did at some point after discovering it crashing) it seems to work now :D.  

apologizes if i wasted peoples time :(
Ahhh, no, this is good news! :D I was worried that newer phones would goof up something like this because we haven't been supporting updates and whatnot for it!
I just went ahead and poked the dev team for BCR, and we're looking to see if something can be done, or at least what's causing the issue. :)

Awesome! I got it back when it was available and still enjoy it sometimes as a fun pastime during some waits. Mine isnt crashing but I would hate for it to stop working, especially after how much I like playing it, and that I cant just reinstall it.
It was taken down after the event, so it's no longer available. I loved it too.
Ohhh I see. I still have it on my phone but it just crashes now when u try to play it. :(
